fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to make a stalker sheet on. The host will create a spreadsheet with all available (game) information regarding this player, posting it in Day Chat at the beginning of the Day Phase. (Unlimited)
- Compliment another player on how their hair looks when blowing in the wind. This permanently sets their defense to Vulnerable, and redirects any players visiting their neighbors into visiting them instead. (x2 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Astral visitor, as going outside and doing things yourself is quite overrated.
- Any abilities used by roles that come from video games, be it an actual character or a reference to a series, will have the strength of said ability doubled. How this is done is up for interpretation by the host.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate everyone who doesn't actually exist.
